short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert filepath strings from one format to another

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly convert a file or directory path from one format to another.

Copy a path onto the clipboard, press the shortcut keys, then paste the converted path where you need it.

Supports Windows- and Unix-style paths. Format paths with escape characters if needed. Customizable path formats.
